{"step_by_step_thinking": "Gutta-percha is a material used in dentistry, particularly in endodontics for root canal fillings. It is known to contain about 20% gutta-percha, not 60-70%, and about 70% zinc oxide. It can indeed be sterilized by heating and it does become brittle over time. Also, it has two forms, alpha and beta.", "answer_choice": "A"}
